[code]import java.io.*;
public class SpecialHandler {
public int specialAmount = 100;
public int specialDelay = 0;
public boolean usingSpecial = false;
public int specialDamage = 0;
public boolean returnWeapon(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return true;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return true;
}
else
return false;
}
public int returnWeaponEmote(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 1068;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 1658;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 451;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 1060;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 451;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 426;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 440;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 2067;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 2075;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 2066;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 2080;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 2068;
}
else
return 0;
}
public int GetSpecDamage(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 18 + misc.random(8);
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 20 + misc.random(10);
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 18 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 20 + misc.random(10);
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 30 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 20 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 22 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 10 + misc.random(5);
}
else
return 0;
}
public int GetSpecCost(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 25;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 50;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 50;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 40;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 75;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 50;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 100;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 100;
}
else
return 0;
}
public int GetSpecProjectile(int WepID) {
if (WepID == 5698) {
return 252;
}
if (WepID == 4151) {
return 341;
}
if (WepID == 1305) {
return 248;
}
if (WepID == 1434) {
return 251;
}
if (WepID == 4587) {
return 347;
}
if (WepID == 861) {
return 256;
}
if (WepID == 3204) {
return 282;
}
if (WepID == 4755) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4734) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4718) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4726) {
return 432;
}
if (WepID == 4747) {
return 432;
}
else
return 0;
}
public void fsBar(int one, int two, int three) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
if (p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)) {
person.fsBar(one, two, three);
}
}
}
public void sendFrame126(String one, int two) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
if (p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)) {
person.sendFrame126(one, two);
}
}
}
public void l33thax(int id) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
if (p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)) {
person.l33thax(id);
}
}
}
public static void createSpec(int castId, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int startHeight, int endHeight, int enemyY, int enemyX, int MageAttackIndex) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if(p != null) {
client person = (client)p;
if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)
person.specspell(castId, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, startHeight, endHeight, enemyY, enemyX, MageAttackIndex);}
}
}
